https://kombo.dev (YC S22) - Product-minded Engineers - Berlin - In-office (with flexibility) - 60k-100k

We are a small (~25), fast-growing (we went from $1M -> $2.5M ARR in the last 6-months) team building a unified API for HR systems. Right now, we are struggling to keep up with customer demand and desperately need to add more engineering power.

We are hiring multiple (product-minded) engineers and support/solution engineers of all experience levels. Jobs are here: https://jobs.ashbyhq.com/Kombo
